abstract: Spring branding day still continues on some cattle ranches in American West, where newborn animals are branded with hot iron; procedure has been scored as cruel, and some ranchers are using alternate methods like ear tags or branding with frozen nitrogen instead of heat; third-generation Colorado rancher Bill Gray is among those sticking to traditional methods.

headline.print_headline: Branding Day, Still Tradition on a Colorado Ranch
headline.main: Branding Day, Fading Elsewhere, Still a Ritual on Colorado Ranch

snippet: Technology has changed much in the West. But on Bill Gray’s ranch in Colorado, they’re preserving the roping and riding skills that make a cowboy a cowboy....
lead_paragraph: Technology has changed much in the West. But on Bill Gray’s ranch in Colorado, they’re preserving the roping and riding skills that make a cowboy a cowboy.
